title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4119.4 - Bonus
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4119.4 - Bonus

State Regulations

No owner, trainer or driver or their agent shall demand
of a licensed harness race track a bonus of money or other special award or
consideration as a condition for starting a horse already entered to
race. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4119.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
